title: Secret Locations Fiji Guest Mix
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #004 🌐

🔥 The moment has arrived. Secret Locations Fiji presents their exclusive set for Digital Textures, a selection that reflects over two decades of passion for Progressive House.

💬 "It is an honor to contribute this exclusive mix for Digital Textures. We believe in the importance of collaborating with platforms and people who share our passion, spreading the love for electronic music around the world. For this session, we drew inspiration from the Argentinian talents Paul Deep, John Cosani, and Matias Chilano, artists we consider to be among the most *underrated* in the Progressive House scene.
We hope you enjoy this journey as much as we enjoyed creating it. Gracias, Thank You & Vinaka Vaka Levu!!!" — Secret Locations Fiji 🎶✨

title: SMN
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #003 🌐

🔥 In our third episode, we dive into the unique style of JulietEko, taking us on a sonic journey exploring downtempo, deep house, progressive, and more. 🎶✨

His set, titled SMN, features a selection that plays with different speeds and rhythm changes. In his spare time, JulietEko blends diverse genres like rock 'n' roll, reggae, pop, and rap from the '70s, '80s, '90s, and 2000s, creating sets full of emotion, movement, and dynamic sensations. 🎸🎤🎧

💬 "For this set, I was inspired to showcase some of the new music from late January and early February. I really enjoy creating different curves throughout the set, and I hope you like my selection." — JulietEko ✨

title: Pulse
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #002 🌐

🔥 Our second episode called "Pulse" features the talent of ARiZ, a resident DJ of the channel, taking us on a sonic journey through deep and atmospheric sounds.

🎶✨ With a selection that blends deep house, melodic techno, progressive, and electronica, ARiZ draws inspiration from artists like Mr. G, Moodymann, Honey Dijon and Solomun to shape his musical identity.

💬 "This set is a space where the melodic and the progressive merge to create an immersive experience. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do." — ARiZ

title: Overture
description:
🌐 Digital Textures: Ep. #001 🌐

 Kicking off our series with our DJ resident J.C.V. and his intro set “Overture”—showcasing the deep and immersive sounds of Progressive house.

 “ i recorded this set inspired by the energy and landscapes of my beautiful city. Enjoy the journey. Much love!” — J.C.V.
